actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to authorize additional projects for the production and marketing of industrial hydrocarbons and alcohols from agricultural commodities and forest products.

summary.text: Amends the Rural Development Act of 1972 to increase from four to 16 the number of pilot projects mandated for the production and marketing of industrial hydrocarbons and alcohols from agricultural commodities and forest products.

titles.title: A bill to authorize additional projects for the production and marketing of industrial hydrocarbons and alcohols from agricultural commodities and forest products.
